titleStmt.title: Hoplocrisma-spongus: or, A sponge to vvipe avvay the weapon-salve A treatise, wherein is proved, that the cure late-taken up amongst us, by applying the salve to the weapon, is magicall and unlawfull By William Foster Mr. of Arts, and parson of Hedgley in the county of Buckingham.
Hoplocrisma-spongus.
titleStmt.author: Foster, William, 1591-1643.

Hoplocrisma-spongus.
